author: tmmuessig
body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Write a descriptive title.
- [X] Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- [X] Search the existing issues.
- [X] Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- [X] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

when running the the following command `get-service | Select-Object -First 10 | Select-Object DisplayName, Name | Out-String | Out-File C:\Temp\Temp.txt` with PowerShell 7.2.5 the data written to the file is not consistent with what is seen in version 5.1.  The on screen results look correct, but only when written out to the file are extra characters added to the header row.

In these examples below, I used `Set-Content` but the same error happens if you use `Out-File`, `Add-Content` or `Set-Content`.

### Expected behavior

```console
see screenshot
```


### Actual behavior

```console
see screenshot
```


### Error details

```console
There is no error
```


### Environment data

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.2.5
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.2.5
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.25151
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```


### Visuals


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7741612/177586337-f15e90f8-2bf2-430b-98d8-1c00fd5aec97.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7741612/177587135-af8bdbd4-b326-4ac6-ba5a-df89da4cf89a.png)

comments.author: jhoneill
comments.body:
Ansi corruption has affected most of the 7.2.x releases (IIRC 7.2.0 was OK and it came in with 7.2.1, or 7.2.2)  It has been logged so many time that it almost needs its own flag :-) 

Good news is it is fixed in current previews of 7.3

comments.author: StevenBucher98
comments.body: I was able to reproduce for 7.2.5 and seems to be fixed in the latest 7.3 preview 🥳 Closing issue since it seems to be fixed in latests preview

title: Out-File, Add-Content, and  Set-Content are adding extra characters to output when written to file
